title: (x) CKY logo - custom designed {Patrick Broderick}
content:
Does anyone no how to find the Camp Kill Yourself   
font?(You can find it pretty much everywhere w/ thier name on it,in red,black,& yellow.)
author: threechairblack

comments.content:
It's the last one -- I'm pretty sure it's custom lettering, designed to look like an old Ozzy Osbourne logo (see below).   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070309024946im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25931.jpg)   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070309024946im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25932.jpg)
Yeah, that makes sense, good find! And great cover too! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20070309024946im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

Damn...I should have known...I used to love that album(actually I still do).   
   
Oh well. Thanks.
